spells.name: Absorb Toxicity
spells.description: You become immune to diseases and toxins, absorb one, and then spread it to others.

spells.name: Animal Aspect, Greater
spells.description: As animal aspect, but you gain two animal qualities.

spells.name: Burst of Speed
spells.description: You gain increased speed, and your movement ignores attacks of opportunity and allows you to move through the space of creatures larger than you are.

spells.name: Darkvision, Communal
spells.description: As darkvision, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Delay Poison, Communal
spells.description: As delay poison, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Endure Elements, Communal
spells.description: As endure elements, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Lightning Lash Bomb Admixture
spells.description: Empowers bombs you throw with a ward that deals lightning damage each time those damaged by the bomb move more than 5 feet.

spells.name: Protection from Arrows, Communal
spells.description: As protection from arrows, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Resinous Skin
spells.description: You gain DR 5/piercing and +4 to CMD against disarm attempts.

spells.name: Resist Energy, Communal
spells.description: As resist energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Spider Climb, Communal
spells.description: As spider climb, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
